articles.title: Why your Samsung, Sony and LG 4K TV will look hugely inferior this month - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG, Sony and LG 4K TV owners could see things look very outdated this month with some big-screen updates expected to be announced very soon.
articles.content:
Not to be outdone, LG is also holding its big keynote next week and the Korean firm has given an early glimpse of what's to come.
